Title: Desktop Eml (Eml) Viewer (2014)
Description: A desktop application that reads and displays the 'eml' files created by Windows Live Mail (Windows 7)
HomeWiki:
Project Description
A desktop application that reads and displays the 'eml' files created by Windows Live Mail (Windows 7)

This is a light-weight desktop application with a convenient and intuitive drag-and-drop interface.

Windows 8 does not contain a native tool for reading the 'eml' (Email) files created by Windows Live Mail (Windows 7). This application aims to fill the gap.

A sample screen shot of the application is shown below...

Double-clicking an item opens it for viewing


For more details, visit https://tciemlreader.codeplex.com/documentation

Techie Stuff

The application is written in C#/WPF using the .NET 4.5 framework. It incorporates the "OpenPop" package distributed by "Source Forge" (http://sourceforge.net/projects/hpop/). The application requires Visual Studio 2013 to build and deploy.
